mapper.sql: id, prj_name, prj_status, wall_out_png_url, beam_in_png_url, beam_in_txt_url, beam_out_txt_url, beam_out_png_url, beam_upload_time, wall_upload_time, transform_time, txt_file_name, png_file_name, user_name, beam_design_type, beam_up, beam_long, beam_low
mapper.select: SELECT id, prj_name, prj_status, wall_out_png_url, beam_in_png_url, beam_out_txt_url, beam_out_png_url, upload_time, transform_time, txt_file_name, png_file_name, user_name FROM beam_transform_info WHERE user_name = #{userName} ORDER BY transform_time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into wall_transform_info (user_name, in_txt_url, in_png_url, out_txt_url, out_png_url, upload_time, transform_time, txt_file_name, png_file_name, prj_name) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inTxtUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inPngUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outTxtUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outPngUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{transformTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{txtFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pngFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prjName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into wall_transform_info
user_name,
in_txt_url,
in_png_url,
out_txt_url,
out_png_url,
upload_time,
transform_time,
txt_file_name,
png_file_name,
prj_name,

mapper.select: SELECT in_txt_url,in_png_url,out_txt_url,out_png_url,upload_time,prj_name FROM wall_transform_info WHERE user_name = #{userName} ORDER BY upload_time DESC
SELECT txt_file_name,png_file_name from beam_transform_info where user_name = #{username} and prj_name = #{prjname}
